title: Sonic Adventure 2 HD + Battle DLC [PS3] [PSN]
description:
Sonic Adventure 2 HD with battle mode dlc, the .rap for the dlc, and reActpsn 2.26.
This is the US version. I can confirm it to work on Rebug 4.30 and 4.41.

To install game.

1. Install Sonic Adventure 2 and reActpsn. (Don't install the battle mode yet.)
2. Open game.
3. Quit game.
4. Open reActpsn.
5. Press the circle button a few times.
6. The full version of the game should now be unlocked.

To install DLC

1. Create a new user and name it "aa".
2. If you haven't already, open sonic adventure 2.
3. Quit game.
4. Now install the battle mode.pkg
5. Put the "exdata" folder on your flash drive and plug into ps3.
6. Now run reActpsn and DO NOT press any buttons.
7. Open the game again and the titele screen should now say "Sonic Adventure 2
   Battle".
